title: Oncology medical image
info:
ANTsPY Tutorial

Required inputs:
• Anatomical brain medical image: 2D image to analyze
 Accepted modalities: 'T1', 'T2'
 Two files with different tags: 'r16' and 'r64'

content: PyANTs tool can perform the following steps:

title: Which step/s do you want to execute?

'mrf' parameters as a string, usually "[smoothingFactor,radius]" where smoothingFactor determines the amount of smoothing and radius determines the MRF neighborhood, as an ANTs style neighborhood vector eg "1x1" for a 2D image.
